item.title: Brain Computer Interface with Unary Computing
item.description: Brain-like computers as brain computers. Design low-power brain computer interface with unary computing.

item.title: Hybrid Unary Binary Architecture
item.description: Design hybrid unary binary architecture to avoid overly large power in fully streaming architecture, which is usually fully parallel.

item.title: Performance Simulation for Unary Computing
item.description: Simulate the performance of unary computing in the context of binary memory system.

item.title: Functional Simulation for Unary Computing
item.description: We create UnarySim to simulate the functionality of unary computing in a cycle-accurate manner.

item.title: Fully Streaming Unary Architecture
item.description: Design unary computing architecture and microarchitecture that does not introduce latency overhead in binary-unary data inter-conversion, so as to maximally overlap the computing at different stages for hardware efficiency. This category of design is usually fully parallel.
